subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Carlos Sastre put in a strong ride and finished close enough behind Cadel Evans in the 33-mile time trial to remain in the yellow jersey by 1 minute 5 seconds over Evans.
snippet: Carlos Sastre put in a strong ride and finished close enough behind Cadel Evans in the 33-mile time trial to remain in the yellow jersey by 1 minute 5 seconds over Evans.
